subject: Thanks for subscribing to EZ Sports Netting
html:
Thanks for subscribing to EZ Sports Netting!

We’ll send occasional deals and product updates. You can unsubscribe anytime.
text: Thanks for subscribing to EZ Sports Netting! We’ll send occasional deals and product updates.
